h2_title: Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide
content: When the mantis is dead, you'll receive Dian-Cui Loong-Soaring Bracers. With all the main bosses finished, for now, it's time to follow Zhu Bajie up the mountain. On the way though, there are just two more optional bosses to capture to wrap up this portion of the Chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Emerald-Armed_Mantis.md', within the main section titled 'Emerald-Armed Mantis', specifically from the subsection 'Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When the mantis is dead, you'll receive Dian-Cui Loong-Soaring Bracers. With all the main bosses finished, for now, it's time to follow Zhu Bajie up the mountain. On the way though, there are just two more optional bosses to capture to wrap up this portion of the Chapter.
